config.tiptapshow.title: TipTapShow config
config.tiptapshow.description.renderingu: Whether or not to render the overlay while in a GUI
config.tiptapshow.description.countclick: When enabled, clicks will count when in a screen
config.tiptapshow.description.keyshadow: When enabled, the key text will be rendered with a shadow
config.tiptapshow.description.background: The color of the square behind the key
config.tiptapshow.description.pressedbac: The color of the square behind the key when the key is pressed
config.tiptapshow.description.pressedkey: The color of the key when it's pressed
